posts.content:
Hi Everyone,

We are running CamperFest for the 4th year and think it would be a great way to spend your Easter weekend. We offer the unique opportunity to camp in the heart of a city at Chester Racecourse and we will be running the event alongside Chester Food and Drink Festival.

If you are interested don't hesitate to find out more by heading over to our website where you can book tickets now!!

http://www.chesterfoodanddrink.co.uk/camperfest/

Alternatively you can like us on facebook to keep up to date with what's going on!!

http://www.facebook.com/camperfest

Hope to see you there this Easter

The CamperFest Team

xx
